entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -3.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of drizzle overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
